alert.note: Alert for Jack (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 4:58AM CDT until June 13 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN JACK COUNTY... At 457 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fort Richardson State Park, or just south of Jacksboro, moving east at 35 mph. This storm has a history of producing half-dollar size hail. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Jacksboro, Fort Richardson State Park, Lake Bridgeport, Gibtown, Joplin, Lost Creek Reservoir, Wizard Wells and Vineyard. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection stay inside a sturdy structure and keep away from windows.
